Description: Blue glazed composition shabti of Ankhhor with a lappet-wig, a modelled face with a beard, parallel hands in relief holding an incised adze and the string of the seed-basket which hangs over the shoulder; the figure is inscribed with part of Chapter 6 of the Book of The Dead in rows of inscribed Hieroglyphs on the back of the wig, across the back of the arms and around the legs.
